reasoning: Aggregate BOTEC estimate summing major vascular inflammatory conditions: vasculitis/primary systemic vasculitides (~50 per 100k), endocarditis (~5 per 100k), myocarditis (~15 per 100k), pericarditis (~8 per 100k), giant cell/temporal arteritis (~10 per 100k), and other arteritides (~7 per 100k) = ~95 per 100k. Heterogeneous conditions with clinical and epidemiological variation.
